subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Alabama State’s Deshean Porchea collapsed and died after playing in a pickup game on campus in Montgomery. A 19-year-old sophomore reserve guard, Porchea passed out Wednesday after walking off the court and never regained consciousness. A university spokeswoman said an autopsy was performed Thursday.
